actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to stabilize and freeze as of January 1, 1973, the Veterans' Administration Schedule for Rating Disabilities, 1945 edition, and the extensions thereto.

summary.text: To amend title 38, United States Code, to stabilize and "freeze" as of January 1, 1973, the Veterans' Administration Schedule for Rating Disabilities, 1945 edition, and the extension thereto.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to stabilize and freeze as of January 1, 1973, the Veterans' Administration Schedule for Rating Disabilities, 1945 edition, and the extensions thereto.
